data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Bihor, Romania so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bihor, Romania
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Bihor, Romania.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Bihor, Romania not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 35,446 believers living in the state of Bihor. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Azerbaijani people.
Spirit, please convict the believers in Bihor, Romania to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Bihor that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.section_summary:
the state of Bihor, Romania has a population of 560,000.

We estimate Bihor has 35,446 people who might know Jesus, 489,026 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 35,528 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 15 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 524,554 lost in Bihor that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

location.name: Bihor
location.people_groups_list: Tajik, Jew, Eastern Yiddish-speaking, Bashkir, Chinese, general, Czech
